Who am I?

About Me

I am currently a high school student in Grade twelve at Sandwich Secondary in LaSalle, Ontario. I enjoy working with computers and solving complex problems. At school, my favourite subjects are computer, math, and science related. Through self-teaching and projects I have completed, I have developed many new skills. My goals for the future involve attending university to study in the fields of Computer Science or Engineering.

In my free time I enjoy exercising, working on projects, and playing sports.

Feel free to contact me at any time via email. I also encourage you to view my github account and resume.

My Projects

The purpose of this project was to create a fully functional robot using an Arduino microcontroller. The robot performs certain maneuvers based on input from a Bluetooth terminal application.

Arduino Robot
The goal of this project was to create a system designed to sort objects based on color. Red, green, and yellow skittles were sorted with the use of two micro servos and a TCS230 color sensor .

Skittle Sorter
I recreated the popular game 'Flappy Bird'. I programmed the game in python utilizing the pygame library.

Flappy Bird (Recreation)
I created a GUI (Graphical User Interface) in Python using the PyQt5 and googletrans libraries. The GUI prompts the user to enter a sentence. It then displays the translation in a variety of different languages based on your selection.

Word Translation GUI
I datascraped NFL team stats from ESPN.com and wrote them to a CSV file leveraging Python. The goal of this project was to see if there was a correlation between a team's wins, and the amount of yards they passed for in the 2020-2021 regular season.

NFL Statistics Data Scraper

I have also created two websites, aside from this one. The code for both can be seen on my Github.

Github

Work Experience

Service Employee

Tim Hortons

July 2018 - Present

I am currently an employee at Tim Horton's. I am responsible for efficiently filling customer orders and guaranteeing customer satisfaction. I ensure that proper safety guidelines and procedures are followed during the preparation and storage of food items. I actively work with a team of co-workers to ensure group goals are met.
